data: MASA Li et al. (2024e)
Multi-agent framework including specialized risk and return agents
Reward-based incentive mechanism for strategic diversity
Achieved superior risk-adjusted returns in CSI300, DJIA, and S&P500
FreQuant Jeon et al. (2024)
Frequency domain analysis for pattern identification
Multi-resolution asset representation via DFT
ARR: 2.1Ã— improvement, enhanced stability during market fluctuations
EarnMore Zhang et al. (2024d)
Customized portfolio pool utilizing maskable tokens
Self-supervised learning based masking and reconstruction
Return rate: +40%, risk level is similar
TrendTrader Ding et al. (2024b)
Multimodal fusion of price and market sentiment
Spatio-temporal reinforcement learning (RL) framework
Superior performance in ARR, ASR, and MDD across DJIA, SSE-50
Network-EDM Hui and Wang (2024)
Extreme risk mitigation based on network theory
Utilization of maximum independent set for diversification
Outstanding performance during CSI 300 market downturns (bear market)
Market-Graph Yamagata and Ono (2024)
Market graph-based clustering for index tracking
Transaction turnover sparsity regularization using primal-dual partitioning
Achieved higher Sharpe ratio in S&P500
LLM-Alpha Kou et al. (2024)
LLM-based alpha factor discovery
Multi-agent system applying dynamic weight gating
Return rate: +53.17% (Market return rate: -11.73%) (China, 2023)
